outputs.name: unit
outputs.description: Units of the data_type (e.g. C) (Default: unknown)

outputs.name: metadata
outputs.description: Optional metadata associated with the Header.

inputs.name: _header
inputs.description: The header of the DataCollection (containing metadata).

name: LB Deconstruct Header
description:
Deconstruct a Ladybug Header into its components.
